Public Register

This service is new and will replace the current public registers provided by the Gambling Commission.

Features of the service

This service allows users to search, view or download information about:

  • operator licence holders
  • personal licence holders
  • regulatory action taken by the Gambling Commission
  • licensed gambling premises

Feedback requirements

If you choose to enrol to take part in this research, full details of what we want you to do will be provided to you. Including how to provide feedback.

We are after feedback on the following areas of this service:

  • the features provided in the service
  • how easy the service is to use
  • the language used in the service

Enrol

If you are happy to take part in this project, you can start enrolment.

We'll ask you to confirm a few things and we'll send you an email with the next steps.
